column2: name
Prestart Inspections
Details
Site has been cleaned in advance of our arrival on site
Walls are plumb and level
IMPORTANT
Tiling works running to programme - prior trades completed
Gib compound and sanding cleaned up from rooms (prior to any works)
Task Analysis signed onto by tilers and provided to main contractor (PHOTO REQUIRED)
Data sheets, of products, are supplied on site with TA's
Inductions completed & Site Inspection checklist has been completed
All tools tagged and tested - (photo's required)
Tiler has current site safe - Input number and expiry
Tiler has correct PPE relevant to project.
Correct drawings being utilised by TAL Tiling. (Check on site for latest revision)
Wall/Floor Preparation
Details
Is the area clean, and cleared, ready for necessary preparation
Grinding, if required, completed before works (photo required) after works (photo required)
Floor levelling completed and applied as per requirements. (m2 rate)
Floor levelling completed - hours and bags used to be recorded (if per bag/labour rate)
Tiling Installation Floors
Tiling to floors
Tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Floor/Wall substrate straight, signed off by MC, and ready for installation. (insert notes for remediation if required)
Install tiles to floors as per drawings
Grout nominated is the correct colour and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
Tiling Installation Floors/Walls
Tiling to floors and walls
Tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Floor/Wall substrate straight, signed off by MC, and ready for installation. (insert notes for remediation if required)
Install tiles to floors as per drawings
Wall tiles set out to match floor grout lines or as per drawings. (Provide explanation if changed)
Install tiles to walls as per drawings
Grout nominated is the correct colour and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
Other Information
Details
Variations or extra works added into folder - all works and materials noted. Use ISSUES tab.
change of details and or instructions
Site specific details to be added
Material Details - Notes to be added of materials used on site
Final Sign Off for Invoicing
